Q:I just want to make sure I understand, Mr. President. Do you mean to-
day  that  because  you  were  not  engaging  in  sexual  activity  with  Ms.
Lewinsky during the deposition that the statement of Mr. Bennett might
be literally true?
A:No, sir. I mean that at the time of the deposition, it had been—that was
well beyond any point of improper contact between me and Ms. Lewinsky.
